docs.lead_paragraph: Women seeking an abortion in Portugal will have to pay for the procedure and attend mandatory prior counselling under legal changes approved by Parliament.

headline.main: Portugal Changes Abortion Law, Demands Payment, Counselling
headline.print_headline: Portugal Changes Abortion Law, Demands Payment, Counselling

docs.snippet: Women seeking an abortion in Portugal will have to pay for the procedure and attend mandatory prior counselling under legal changes approved by Parliament.

docs.lead_paragraph: Republican presidential candidates and lawmakers are calling for Planned Parenthood to be investigated and its federal funding eliminated after two videos that critics said showed the reproductive health care group is involved in the illegal sale of aborted fetal tissue.

headline.main: Republicans Seek Probe of Abortion Rules After Planned Parenthood Videos
headline.print_headline: Republicans Seek Probe of Abortion Rules After Planned Parenthood Videos

docs.lead_paragraph: A new memoir hopes to further the debate on immigration policy.

headline.main: From an ‘Undocumented’ Boyhood to a Doctorate

docs.abstract: Dan-el Padilla Peralta, who lived as undocumented immigrant in United States since age 4 and is now postdoctoral fellow in humanities at Columbia University, hopes to further national discussion about immigration policy with memoir Undocumented: A Dominican Boy’s Odyssey From a Homeless Shelter to the Ivy League.
docs.snippet: A new memoir hopes to further the debate on immigration policy.

docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Gebhard, who trained as an anthropologist, wrote the groundbreaking “Sexual Behavior in the Human Female” with Dr. Alfred C. Kinsey in 1953.

headline.main: Paul Gebhard, Sex Researcher Who Worked With Kinsey, Dies at 98
headline.print_headline: Paul Gebhard Dies at 98; Worked on Kinsey Reports

docs.abstract: Paul Gebhard, who worked on sexual behavior research with Dr Alfred C Kinsey in 1950s, dies at age 98.
docs.snippet: Dr. Gebhard, who trained as an anthropologist, wrote the groundbreaking “Sexual Behavior in the Human Female” with Dr. Alfred C. Kinsey in 1953.

docs.lead_paragraph: The percentage of U.S. teenagers who have had sex has dropped significantly over the past quarter-century, with less than half of 15- to 19-year-olds reporting they had a sexual experience, according to U.S. data released on Wednesday.

headline.main: Rate of U.S. Teens Having Sex Has Dropped in Past 25 Years: Federal Data
headline.print_headline: Rate of U.S. Teens Having Sex Has Dropped in Past 25 Years: Federal Data

docs.snippet: The percentage of U.S. teenagers who have had sex has dropped significantly over the past quarter-century, with less than half of 15- to 19-year-olds reporting they had a sexual experience, according to U.S. data released on Wednesday.

docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. appeals court on Wednesday permanently blocked a North Dakota law that banned most abortions once a fetal heartbeat can be detected, as early as six weeks after conception.

headline.main: Appeals Court Permanently Blocks North Dakota 'Heartbeat' Abortion Ban
headline.print_headline: Appeals Court Permanently Blocks North Dakota 'Heartbeat' Abortion Ban

docs.snippet: A U.S. appeals court on Wednesday permanently blocked a North Dakota law that banned most abortions once a fetal heartbeat can be detected, as early as six weeks after conception.

docs.lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court agreed Wednesday that one of the nation's most restrictive abortion laws is unconstitutional — a North Dakota statute banning abortions when a fetal heartbeat is detected as early as six weeks into a pregnancy.

headline.main: Court Agrees With Tossing Strict North Dakota Abortion Law
headline.print_headline: Court Agrees With Tossing Strict North Dakota Abortion Law

docs.snippet: A federal appeals court agreed Wednesday that one of the nation's most restrictive abortion laws is unconstitutional — a North Dakota statute banning abortions when a fetal heartbeat is detected as early as six weeks into a pregnancy.

docs.lead_paragraph: A high school teacher accused of having sex with six male students has a brain condition that left her defenseless to the students' aggressive behavior, her lawyer said.

headline.main: Lawyer Cites Teacher's Health Issues in Student Sex Assaults
headline.print_headline: Lawyer Cites Teacher's Health Issues in Student Sex Assaults

docs.snippet: A high school teacher accused of having sex with six male students has a brain condition that left her defenseless to the students' aggressive behavior, her lawyer said.
